com.csipsimple.api

Class MediaState

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.csipsimple.api.MediaState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Parcelable

    public class MediaState
extends Object
implements Parcelable
    Represents state of the media device layer
    This class helps to serialize/deserialize the state of the media layer
    The fields it contains are direclty available.
    Changing these fields has no effect on the device audio : it's only a structured holder for datas
    This class is not related to SIP media state this is managed by SipCallSession.MediaState

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MediaState()
      Constructor for a media state object
      It will contains default values for all flags This class as no setter/getter for members flags
      It's aim is to allow to serialize/deserialize easily the state of media layer, not to modify it
